pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform Common JavaScript Operations in Shiny Apps using Plain R Code // Perform common JavaScript operations in Shiny applications without having to know any JavaScript. Examples include hiding an element, disabling an input, resetting an input back to its original value, and many more useful functions. Even if you do know JavaScript, shinyjs can be used as convenience functions to avoid dealing with message passing and writing JavaScript code. shinyjs can also be used to easily run your own custom JavaScript functions from R.
